original_title: Hancock-Pacific Galapagos Expedition: The Empress of the Galapagos
overview: The film depicts life on Charles Island in the Galapagos, where members of the expedition encountered an assortment of German colonists while conducting their research. The film was often shown by expedition head, Allan Hancock, with his lectures.
title: Hancock-Pacific Galapagos Expedition: The Empress of the Galapagos
